mui_comp_options_desc:
Enable/disable components of MUI, returning them to the OVK defaults.
[REQUIRES MAP RELOAD]
mui_size_desc: Set the size of the panel.
mui_player_size_desc: Set the size of your player panel.
mui_team_size_desc: Set the size of other player panels.
mui_label_size_desc: Set the size of labels in-game.
mui_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of the panel.
mui_player_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of your player panel.
mui_team_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of other player panels.
mui_label_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of labels in-game.
mui_wmul_desc: Determines the width of the panel as Size x Multiplier.
mui_rows_desc: Set the number of text rows to display.
mui_player_damage_desc: Display a red health indicator when damage is taken.
mui_player_stamina_desc: Display circle stamina indicator when low.
mui_team_ai_desc: Toggle the display of AI player panels.
mui_player_sp_dock_desc:
Choose where on your player panel special equipment should be docked.
(Keycards, crowbars, etc)
mui_team_sp_dock_desc:
Choose where on other player panels special equipment should be docked.
(Keycards, crowbars, etc)
mui_special_row_desc: Number of equipment rows to make space for.
mui_player_revives_desc: Display warning when you are in danger of going into custody.
mui_team_revives_desc: Display warning when a teammate is in danger of going into custody.
mui_player_absorb_desc: Display your Maniac damage absorption radial.
mui_team_absorb_desc: Display Maniac damage absorption radial for teammates.
mui_direction_desc:
Set the panel stacking direction;
horizontal, vertical.
mui_general_options_desc: Customizations that affect all player panels.
mui_gen_jtfy_desc:
Justify panels along secondary axis;
defer to position, top/left, center, bottom/right.
mui_ammo_desc:
Set the total ammo display style.
Current + spare ammo (default), spare ammo, number of clips.
mui_hp_color_desc:
Set health radials to player colour. Leaves shadow.
[REQUIRES WHITE TEXTURE & MAP RELOAD]
mui_gen_hp_aspd_desc:
Set the time player health takes to animate on damage/restore in milliseconds.
0 disables animation.
mui_gen_sh_aspd_desc:
Set the time player shield takes to animate on damage/restore in milliseconds.
0 disables animation.
mui_stats_options_desc: Customizations that affect the stats (TAB) panel.
mui_stats_origin_desc:
Set the position the panel should be brought in from;
top, right, bottom, left.
mui_stats_aspd_desc:
Set the time the panel takes to enter view in milliseconds.
0 disables animation.
mui_keybind_options_desc: Customize what keys are bound to functions run in-game.
mui_info_keybind_desc:
Bind a key to hide/show objective/assault/hostage/timer panels, if they exist.
[ONLY APPLICABLE WITH STATISTICS COMPONENT DISABLED]
mui_mask_instruct_desc: Show the prompt to put your mask on when the game begins.
mui_begin_hidden_desc:
Info panels begin hidden and are displayed on button press.
[ONLY APPLICABLE WITH STATISTICS COMPONENT DISABLED]
mui_subtitle_limit_desc:
The maximum amount of subtitles that can be displayed at one time.
If limit is exceeded the oldest subtitle is phased out.
mui_subtitle_origin_desc:
Set the position the subtitles should be brought in from;
top, bottom.
mui_subtitle_aspd_desc:
Set the time it takes for subtitles to phase in/out in milliseconds.
0 disables animation.
mui_suspicion_options_desc: Customizations for the suspicion meters in stealth.
mui_suspicion_aspd_desc:
Set the time it takes for the suspicion bars to animate in milliseconds.
0 disables animation.
mui_suspicion_ato_desc:
Set the time it takes before the suspicion interface times out and hides itself.
0 hides instantly.
mui_suspicion_bars_desc:
Choose which suspicion bars to display;
left, both, right, none.
mui_suspicion_detect_desc: Display/Hide the detected text when you are discovered.
mui_suspicion_sound_desc: Play the detected and suspicion sounds.
mui_present_options_desc:
Customizations that affect the notification panels.
E.g. New objective, civilian killed, loot secured.
mui_pst_limit_desc:
The maximum amount of notifications that can be displayed at one time.
Notifications above limit will be queued.
mui_pst_simple_desc: Remove borders and use a simpler animation.
mui_hint_options_desc:
Customizations that affect the hint panel.
E.g. Taking damage, being tazed, can't stand up.
mui_interact_options_desc: Customizations that affect the interaction panel.
mui_ita_txt_mul_desc: Alters text size as percentage of Size.
mui_ita_txt_hide_desc: Hide the 'Press 'F' to interact' text while you are interacting.
mui_aspd_desc: Set the time it takes for the animation to complete in milliseconds.
mui_clean_names_desc:
Clean player names;
Never, When name exceeds character limit, Always, Set to character name, Remove.
mui_font_pref_desc:
MUI will use this font where applicable. [REQUIRES MAP RELOAD]
If you have issues with characters not appearing try changing this.
mui_label_options_desc: Customizations for the label panels above player characters.
mui_label_margin_desc: Set the margin between elements inside of the label.
mui_label_infamy_desc: Display/Hide the spade icon next to infamous players.
mui_label_bag_desc: Display/Hide the bag icon when a player is carrying something.
mui_label_font_desc:
Set the font to use inside label.
Has precedence over Misc Font Preference.
mui_label_stop_desc: Display/Hide the stop icon when an AI player is stopped.
mui_bag_options_desc: Customizations for the bag carry panel.
mui_bag_visible_desc:
If disabled a bag icon will instead be displayed next to player name
much like teammates.
mui_bag_colored_desc:
Colour the bag panel to the same as the player name
or leave white.
mui_voice_options_desc: Customizations for the voice command panel.
mui_voice_keybind_desc: Bind a key to toggle voice command UI.
mui_voice_mouse_desc: Take control of mouse input for clicking voice commands.
mui_voice_expand_desc:
You can add additional voice commands in
PAYDAY 2/mods/MUI/menus/mui_voice_data.json.
mui_comp_enabled_desc:
Enable/disable this component.
The vanilla OVK component will be restored where applicable.
mui_wp_arrow_desc: Enable/disable the directional indicator when not facing the waypoint.
mui_wp_distance_desc: Enable/disable the distance counter when facing the waypoint.
mui_wp_distant_act_desc:
As the player distance to waypoint increases to Distant Range, gradually;
disabled, fade in, fade out.
mui_wp_distant_rng_desc:
Range (in metres) at which waypoint will either be
fully opaque or transparent, depending on Distant Action.
mui_margin_h_desc:
Set the margin between the panel and the right/left border
depending on position.
mui_margin_v_desc:
Set the margin between the panel and the top/bottom border
depending on position.
mui_position_h_desc:
Set the horizontal position of the panel;
left, center, right.
mui_position_v_desc:
Set the vertical position of the panel;
top, center, bottom.
mui_workspace_desc:
Set the screen space usable by MUI [REQUIRES MAP RELOAD];
[HIGHLY OFFENSIVE TO OTHER HUD MODS] safe, full.
